title: Spain national football B team
text:
Spain B was a secondary <a href="soccer">football</a> team run occasionally as support for the <a href="Spain%20national%20football%20team">Spain national football team</a>.
They commonly played matches against 'B' teams from other football associations, from 1949 to 1981.
Player records.
Top appearances.
Note: "Club(s)" represents all the clubs that players played in at the time they did it too in the Bs.
